body: This shit always happens i always see people complaining about it on sites like bato. The husband will be the villain to justify her happy end even though she has admitted she turned him into one. In the latest chapters her husband is paranoid and he's getting forceful out of frustration so now she thinks he's just a horrible rapist but the funny thing is she started dating her ex after he raped her.

But somehow knowing the husband current attitude I wish he finds out that bitch is cheating and murder both his wife and her ex. And with the current chapter on webtoon husband turning into somewhere forceful few more push and the author can make him a full psychopath

Bitch gonna end happy with her ex maybe make hubby regret ewerything get to jail or make ex beat shit out of him! Probably she dont guve a fuck about hubby but not long ago think about how cruel she treat him!

And more in last chapters hubby decide to rape her because bitch reject him again and again and crying so hubby think about that and get angry his wife love ex more than him! Hubby sarat thinking about destroy her!

Even knowing that this story is a big shit, and for sure, the author will turn her husband into a "villain" just to justify this damn bitch, have a happy ending with her shitty ex-boyfriend. Unfortunately, my curiosity keeps me reading this shit

And i read more chapters her ex see how she falin for him and say lets stop meeting. Bitch get destroyed after hear that and make husband go angry because she dont love hubby anymore!  But anyway divorce not happened!
Both sisters huge sluts fmc stupid as fuck dont wanna divorce husband but wanna marry her ex bf wtf wrong with her head?

@Pumba12 you can read it on manytoon it's the manhwa version but it's identical except the manhwa is further forward in the story and she will get a happy ending with her ex because the stupid husband is now being turned into a rapist with a cuck fetish in the latest chapters.

@Packin Heat this story is not end yet, so I think it's too early to say that the wife will get a happy ending with the ex. Although it is likely she will get happy ending, but I kinda hope the author put some plot twist in the story.
wait is she a bitch or what?? what is happening tell me someone
